content: Hello! This is the XYZ home service AI. How can I assist you with your plumbing needs today? Could I start by getting your name, please?
Hi, it's Mary Thompson. I need to fix a leak in my kitchen sink.
Thank you, Mary. Can you please provide your address so I can check our service availability?
I live at 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
Thanks for that! Let me confirm that you're within our service area.
Great news, Mary! You're in our service area. When would be an ideal time for us to come by and fix your kitchen sink?
I’m only available in the evenings after 7 PM during weekdays.
Thank you for letting me know. Let me check our availability for evening slots after 7 PM this week.
Currently, we don't have any openings after 7 PM this week. The soonest available slots are between 9 AM and 4 PM. Would any of those work for you?
Unfortunately, those times won't work for me. I really need evenings due to my schedule.

I understand, Mary. We want to accommodate your schedule but currently don’t have evening availability. If your availability changes or you’d like to try weekend options, please feel free to reach out. Would you like me to keep your request on file in case something opens up?
No, thanks. I’ll call when I can find another time. Appreciate your help though.
reason: Customer declined to schedule due to unavailable time slots
